title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\Operation
name: Operation
description:
This operation resource represents operations that may have happened or are happening on the cluster. All fields are output only.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.Operation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The server-assigned ID for the operation.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the operation is taking place. This field is deprecated, use location instead.

params.name: data.operation_type
params.description: The operation type.

params.name: data.status
params.description: The current status of the operation.

params.name: data.detail
params.description: Detailed operation progress, if available.

params.name: data.status_message
params.description: Output only. If an error has occurred, a textual description of the error.

params.name: data.self_link
params.description: Server-defined URL for the resource.

params.name: data.target_link
params.description: Server-defined URL for the target of the operation.

params.name: data.location
params.description: [Output only] The name of the Google Compute Engine zone or region in which the cluster resides.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: [Output only] The time the operation started, in RFC3339 text format.

params.name: data.end_time
params.description: [Output only] The time the operation completed, in RFC3339 text format.

params.name: data.progress
params.description: Output only. [Output only] Progress information for an operation.

params.name: data.cluster_conditions
params.description: Which conditions caused the current cluster state.

params.name: data.nodepool_conditions
params.description: Which conditions caused the current node pool state.
